message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and features, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. I'm confident you'll find this a worthwhile investment.
Alice,  $20,000 is a bit outside my budget. I'm really interested in this product, but I can only go up to $12,000.  Let me know if that's something you can work with.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $20,000 is significantly lower than what I can accept. This product offers exceptional value, and I'm confident it will benefit you greatly. Could you consider stretching your budget to $17,000?
